name: Biphase
description:
Biphase is a platform jumping puzzle game in which players have to learn how to piece together the fragments of themselves in a broken red-and-black world.

For more information, follow us at:
Facebook: @BiphaseGame
Twitter: @BiphaseG

=======

Well Conceived Levels


Each level within the bipolar transforming world's controllable platforms and near-around-corner exit are well-conceived, and challenge players' intelligence and patience.

Easy to Use


Playing is easy and can be mastered by anyone.
